sentences.sContent: Scorpio The Scorpio animus is that intense, magnetic and mysterious creature clearly hiding volumes of dark secrets beneath a super-cool and calculated demeanor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Scorpio The Scorpio animus is that intense, magnetic and mysterious creature clearly hiding volumes of dark secrets beneath a super-cool and calculated demeanor.
sentences.sCn: 天蝎座——天蝎座女性的男性意向热情、极富吸引力、神秘，在他故意耍酷的行为背后无疑隐藏了许多隐秘之事。

sentences.sContent: Her once serene image was shattered by a wild demeanor and bizarre public appearances, and her once pristine voice became raspy and hoarse, unable to hit the high notes as she used to.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her once serene image was shattered by a wild demeanor and bizarre public appearances, and her once pristine voice became raspy and hoarse, unable to hit the high notes as she used to.
sentences.sCn: 她曾经的高贵形象也被其疯狂行为和古怪的公开亮相彻底击碎，她从前的纯净嗓音也变得沙哑，刺耳，无法唱出曾经的高音。

remMethod.val: 和demean (v. 降低身份) 一起记忆
